title: August Lunch Menu
lunchCost: PreK-5 = $2.75, Grades 6-8 = $2.85, Extra entree = $0.75, Milk is $0.40, Adult = $3.50

lunches.comment: Have a great first day at school.  Dont forget to get your picture taken in the front yard.

lunches.lunch: BBQ meatballs, Mashed Potatoes, Dinner Roll, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. Youre on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one wholl decide where to go.

lunches.lunch: Walking Tacos, Lettuce & Cheese Cup, Spanish Rice, and Fruit
lunches.comment: The time is always right to do what is right.
